name: demo-strike
description: A project to parse CSGO Demos and provide insights into history and stats.

scripts.generate: graphql-codegen --config codegen.yml && npm run prisma:generate -w server
scripts.start: concurrently -k -c blue,bgBlue -n REACT,SERVER "npm run watch -w packages/client" "npm run start:dev -w packages/server"
scripts.start:debug: concurrently -k -c blue,bgBlue -n REACT,SERVER "npm run watch -w packages/client" "npm run start:debug -w packages/server"

author: Luke Montgomery
